item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a formally trained Biochemist and Data Professional. I began my data journey in 2016 as an undergraduate research fellow at the University of Lethbridge. During my time at the U of L, I investigated the relationship between genetic material and various diseases using computational chemistry and laboratory techniques. Nowadays, I focus my data analytics and programming tools on solving any problem that comes my way. Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:

item.title: Cynthia Fonderson
item.description: +1 587-894-3515 | cynthiafonderson@gmail.com | GitHub | LinkedIn | A data professional with over 6 years of experience delivering data-centered insights. Relevant Experience Correlation One | Remote | Data Science Fellow (Oct 2022 to Present) Selected to participate in a 14-week data science Fellowship with learning facilitated through real-world data science business cases. Coordinating and collaborating with a group of five using pregnancy-related mortality datasets from the CDC and census datasets from the U.
